componentInstanceProperties.value: Reinventing Hydration for GenZ and Millennials

componentInstanceProperties.name: titleText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Invest in Australia’s Fastest Growing Hydration Brand

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Key Investment Highlights

  • 11 science backed products and 4 of which have already been listed with the Therapeutics Goods Administration and FDA.
  • Secured placement in 2500 major retail stores including Coles, Woolworths and Coles Express within 12 months.
  • 340% year-on-year revenue growth and projected to reach $50 million within six years
  • Acclaimed entrepreneurs Gretta Van Riel and Dr. Zac Turner have joined the team to drive global expansion.
  • New 1.1million follower network to monetise globally: Across Drop Bottle, Vitadrop, Detox.
  • Positioned to capitalise on the A$2 trillion global health and wellness market, projected to grow at a 7.7% CAGR (2021-2026).
  • Inbound interest for distribution into Hong Kong, New Zealand and the Middle east. Manufacturing and distribution locked in across Australia and global expansion plans ready to go
  • Opportunity in multi billion dollar pharmacy channel with interest from Terry White Pharmacies and Priceline.
  • Highly engaged Genz and Millennial community - a segment underrepresented in traditional retail sales.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Offer

Here’s your chance to invest in a slice of Hydration History.

  • Invest in ordinary shares at $8m valuation
  • Become a part of the community and the next Australian wellness success story
  • This investment opportunity is open to every 18+ Australian resident, and you can invest from just $250.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
What is Vitadrop?

Vitadrop is reinventing hydration with all the essential micronutrients you need to function at your best. In the fast-paced demands of modern life, achieving and sustaining optimal hydration and nutrition has never been easier.
Vitadrop does this through product solutions, programs, and gamification. Vitadrop is 100% Australian made and owned and backed by science.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Founding Story

In 2018, Charlie Wood, a scientific researcher in Melbourne, crossed paths with Dan Concannon, an accomplished creative and ex-rugby professional, whose career had been cut short due to an ulcerative colitis diagonis.

For Charlie the idea of a lifelong career in hospitals and labs wasn’t for him, and with Dan’s newfound focus turning to everyday health management and supplementation, the unlikely pair aligned on a common belief: that staying healthy and hydrated should be enjoyable and effortless. Vitadrop was born. What started as a side hustle quickly evolved into a passion project.

In 2022, Charlie and Dan took the leap, leaving their full-time gigs to pour their hearts, souls, and savings into a business they knew was destined for big things.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Problem and Market

The hydration and nutritional challenges faced by Australians are significant, with 82% of the population not maintaining proper hydration, and 80% individuals not receiving adequate nutrients from their food intake.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Despite being among the world's leading consumers of dietary supplements, including multivitamins, single vitamins, single minerals, herbal supplements, and oil supplements, micronutrient deficiencies persist due to:

  • Constraints on time
  • Lack of awareness regarding the appropriate supplements, their timing, and frequency
  • The inconvenience and cost of purchasing numerous supplements.

Why? It's hard to know what to take, when to take it, and with so many different tables to take it can become inconvenient.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Vitadrop Solution

Vitadrop is changing the way Australians hydrate through products, gamification and devices to "ritualise" hydration and build healthy habits. Vitadrop has developed 11 science-backed products, 4 of which have already been listed with the Therapeutics Goods Administration. Moreover, Vitadrop is developing programmes and tech-enabled hydration devices in partnership with Drop Bottle and Gretta Van Reil. Vitadrop distributes products via major retailers like Coles, Woolworths and Coles Express, and maintains a strong digital and e-commerce to continue building out customer loyalty & value.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
• Functional Hydration: Our water-based products not only hydrate but also level-up overall wellness from energy and sleep to skin and sports recovery.
  • Science backed formulations: We merge science and creativity for optimal effectiveness.
  • Australian Made: Proudly made in regional Australia, our drops ensure the highest quality from local ingredients.
  • Programs: Vitadrop’s 30 days of Hydration programme in collaboration with Gyms and Drop Bottle to generate 1st party data and insights on the transformative effects of Vitadrop solutions.
  • Technology and Devices: Vitadrop strategic acquisition of Drop Bottle paves a path forward to creating technology enable hydration devices to own the hydration action end to end.
  • Tailored for a Modern Audience: Our products seamlessly integrate into the dynamic and contemporary lifestyles of Gen-Z and Millennial consumers.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Competitive Advantage and Go-to-Market

  • Strong advisory and investment team with combined following of 16M+.
  • Omni-channel business model that builds margin accretion built up across Retail -> Online -> Subs.
  • Science backed product, created from internal team, already with TGA listing and FDA approval.
  • Strong unit economics across core range of powdered supplements ensure margins maintained as scale.
  • Unique digital first approach for Hydration supplements brand.
  • All in one solution in the rapidly growing hydration category.
  • Opportunity in x billion dollar pharmacy channel with interest from Terry White Pharmacies and Priceline.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Growth Strategy

Vitadrop is broadening its reach through the expansion of digital marketing and in-store presence. We are creating a fundamental shift in consumer behaviour to optimise health by offering nutrient-infused hydration solutions. With a solid foothold in Australia, Vitadrop is proactively seeking global expansion, receiving interest from major pharmacy lines, and for product distribution in Hong Kong, New Zealand, and the Middle East.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Vitadrop x Drop Bottle - Joining Teams

A water bottle loved by none other than Oprah herself!

  • A part of Gretta joining forces is union of Vitadrop and her hydration brand - Drop Bottle!
  • Together we are planning on on launching an end-to-end instrument to reinvent how people Hydrate.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Exit Strategy

The bet is building the business to 20m+ and selling to a corporate acquirer through APAC. Vitadrop has already had 2 approaches for M+A and wants to build value before exit

componentInstanceProperties.value: Management Team

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Why Invest Through VentureCrowd?

VentureCrowd is the leading digital investment platform for alternative assets. We find and fund the brightest and most innovative startups.

Our curation and due diligence are rigorous and our track record of success speaks for itself:

  • Only digital investment platform in Australia to have successfully delivered multiple exit returns to investors through equity crowdfunding

  • 74K+ members and counting

  • Over $312,000,000 in capital raised since inception

VentureCrowd is investor-led, which means we only list deals with secured professional external lead investors. Our investors then invest on the same economic terms as professional investors. If you invest in one of our deals you will receive equity or ownership in the company raising the capital. Not only might your investment come with lower fees and capital commitments, but it will also come with reduced deal complexity, and you’ll have access to alternative equity, property and credit opportunities on the same terms as professional lead investors.

Invest now

If you would prefer to speak to one of our team members about this offer, please:

  • Book a call or

  • call us on 1300 039 655

Please note, the Fund Manager reserves the right to vary or cancel the Offer, vary the amount raised under the Offer, vary or waive the Minimum Investment and close the Offer, without notice and without giving reasons.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Fees

Investors invest through a VentureCrowd Trust, which VentureCrowd manages as a single asset. We charge an annual management fee to investors, payable on exit and we only charge a performance fee where an exit delivers profit, thereby aligning ourselves with investor outcomes.

  • Contribution Fee: 1.1% This is the fee charged by the Trustee for the establishment of the Trust and the purchasing entity, structuring the overall investment and raising capital by way of issue of Units. Payable upon acceptance of your investment by the Trustee.
  • Management Fee: 1.65% per annum (charged on conversion or exit).
  • Performance Fee: 20% of the profit. We only charge a performance fee on conversion or exit.
  • Off-Market Transfer Fee (if you wish to transfer your holding to someone else): $500 + 2% of the total amount transferred, unless the buyer is identified by you in advance
